item.title: The Texas Floods Were a Preview of What’s to Come
item.description: Mounting evidence shows no US state is safe from the flooding that ravaged Texas’ Kerr Country.

item.title: Why Gov. Greg Abbott won’t release his emails with Elon Musk
item.description: The governor’s office says some emails contain “intimate and embarrassing” information.

item.title: “It’s a heist”: Senator calls out Texas for trying to steal shuttle from Smithsonian
item.description: “The title of this amendment is ‘Houston, We Have a Problem.’”
